channel.title: Why is it just ignoring my edits?
channel.description: right ive got test scape and recently ive been adding thing from tuts, and using compile. Ive added like 20 features onto the server i have start it up...and....its the exact same testscape as if its just been downloaded. I check the client.java file to see if me edit havent been wiped just to be clear. And yet its just loading up like normal. e.g - i edit the welcome message text. so intead of the avi guy as admin it says adam on the client file BUT it still says Avi or what ever in the game. some pelase tell me what the hells going on thanks alot Adam

item.title: Why is it just ignoring my edits?
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Yes u need 2 compile for it 2 save…compiling is like saving and uploading new updates

Read full topic

item.source: Why is it just ignoring my edits?

item.title: Why is it just ignoring my edits?
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

Right click the compiler, edit and delete all that is in it and put in…

@echo off
color 9
title CheezScape Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause;

Save, then compile.

Read full topic
